name: Block n' Bounce
description:
Block n' Bounce

Hyper casual one button game inspired to "Block it" made by Ketchapp, which now seems to be removed from the app stores.

Tap and hold to activate walls and make the ball bounce.
If the ball touches inactive borders, it's game over.
Keeping walls active drains energy.
Each time the ball bounces, you get a little energy bonus.

Tech Specs

FrameworkPhaser 3.55.2LanguageTypeScriptPhysics engineBox2D powered by Planck.js
